step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're doing well placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on a slow inhale through your nose and tightening your whole body muscles. Imagine the fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent work with the slow exhale through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out, just like the instructions say.
You're consistently following the instructions for exhaling and relaxing. Keep up the great work with this visualization!

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth, relaxing. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
